body_html:
Hi @rongjiecomputer , I have a fix internally for this issue.
That's by changing PLATFORM_WINDOWS to COMPILER_MSVC in this file.
PLATFORM_WINDOWS is only defined in tf_copts, COMPILER_MSVC is defined in CROSSTOOL, so it's guaranteed to exist.
body_text:
Hi @rongjiecomputer , I have a fix internally for this issue.
That's by changing PLATFORM_WINDOWS to COMPILER_MSVC in this file.
PLATFORM_WINDOWS is only defined in tf_copts, COMPILER_MSVC is defined in CROSSTOOL, so it's guaranteed to exist.
body:
Hi @rongjiecomputer , I have a fix internally for this issue.
That's by changing `PLATFORM_WINDOWS` to `COMPILER_MSVC` in this file.
`PLATFORM_WINDOWS` is only defined in `tf_copts`, `COMPILER_MSVC` is defined in CROSSTOOL, so it's guaranteed to exist.
